title: GetActionListCount (Method)
text:
METHOD GetActionListCount : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the count of action list and action list text entries in the Action-BACnet-Property and Action_Text-BACnetProperty of this BACnet-Command-Object.
Both the count of action lists and action texts have to be the same, so can be aquired at once.

rows.Name: count
rows.Comment:
The count of action list in the Actio-Property of this
object.
